Product Goals: Enhance the visual appeal of the UI
User Stories: As a player, I want to be able to choose difficulty levels
As a player, I want to see my score after each game
As a player, I want to get a restart button when I lose

As a player, I want to play the game via my mobile phone

Requirement Analysis: The project requires a robust game algorithm, a responsive design for various devices, and an aesthetically pleasing UI to enhance user engagement.
Requirement Pool: Implement a responsive design for mobile and desktop
Develop a game algorithm that supports multiple difficulty levels
Create a visually appealing UI with animations and effects
Integrate a scoring system that tracks and displays user scores
Add a feature to restart the game after losing
UI Design draft: The UI should feature a clean, modern design with smooth animations and intuitive controls. The game board should be the central focus, with score and difficulty selection options easily accessible.
